document_data.name: Jhessail Greycastle
document_data.mainbody: '''Jhessail Greycastle''' was the commander of the exiled [[Knights of the Black Fist]].{{Cite adventurers league/Reclamation of Phlan|6}}
document_data.Personality: Jhessail was despite all loyal to her city and was totally shocked by the Vorgansharax's coup and the betrayal of her fellows.{{Cite adventurers league/Escape from Phlan|16-17}} She was a firebrand sworn to reclaim her city or die trying.
